com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
      • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.MinecraftClassWrapper<net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui>
        • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.gui.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWrapper<net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiScreen

    public class GUI
extends MinecraftClassWrapper<net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui>
    This class wraps around a Minecraft GUI to allow for their methods and fields to be accessed
    Author:
    pcr3w

      • drawTexture

        public GUI drawTexture(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
        Draws the bound texture at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of where the texture should be drawn
        y - The Y coordinate of where the texture should be drawn
        width - The width of the texture
        height - The height of the texture
        Returns:
        The GUI to allow for chaining

      • drawTexture

        public GUI drawTexture(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       int newWidth,
                       int newHeight)
        Draws the bound texture at the given coordinates with the specified width and height
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of where the texture should be drawn
        y - The Y coordinate of where the texture should be drawn
        width - The width of the texture
        height - The height of the texture
        newWidth - The adjusted width of the texture
        newHeight - The adjusted height of the texture
        Returns:
        The GUI to allow for chaining

      • drawCenteredString

        public GUI drawCenteredString(java.lang.String text,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Draws a string centered around the given position
        Parameters:
        text - The string to draw
        x - The X coordinate of the string's centre
        y - The Y coordinate of the string's centre
        Returns:
        The GUI to allow for chaining

      • drawRectangle

        public GUI drawRectangle(int left,
                         int top,
                         int right,
                         int bottom,
                         int colour)
        Draws a rectangle at the given location
        Parameters:
        left - The first X coordinate
        top - The first Y coordinate
        right - The second X coordinate
        bottom - The second Y coordinate
        colour - The colour of the rectangle - use getColour
        Returns:
        The GUI to allow for chaining

        Constructs an int representing the colours given
        Parameters:
        A - How much alpha
        R - How much red
        G - How much green
        B - How much blue
        Returns:
